alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:58AM AKST until January 23 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gust to 35 mph over the highway summits will reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. Wind chill values as low as 45 below are expected. Winds will diminish today but will pick up again tonight. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
